member.name: SFVM_PROPPAGE_DATA
member.summary: Contains the details of a page to be added to an object's Properties sheet.

member.name: SFVM_PROPPAGE_DATA.pfn
member.summary: A pointer to a AddPropSheetPageProc callback function used to add property pages. When this function is used by Windows Explorer, it provides pfn through the system folder view object's method. The callback function can then pass the information to .

member.name: SFVM_PROPPAGE_DATA.lParam
member.summary: The details of the property sheet to be added. When this function is used by Windows Explorer, it provides lParam through the system folder view object's method. The callback function can then pass the information to .
